name: Jeepfire
description:
On a small island, a yearly event gives the residents of same island a contest of hunting... Jeeps? Of all things?

Made for the Roll-the-Dice Game Jam.

Generators used:

https://www.fantasynamegenerators.com/video-game-names.php for name

http://orteil.dashnet.org/gamegen for premise

http://tones.wolfram.com/ for music
